transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello Global Enterprises se Mr. Mohammad Israat ji?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ali sir, namaste. Sunil baat kar raha hu IndiaMART ke behalf mein.
Customer: Ji, boliye sir.
Executive: Ji, aapki aapki side se ek IndiaMART pe concern raise tha jiska jiske aapne mention kiya hua hai ki aap jo lead karte ho woh only for Bangalore location se karte ho but aapki company toh Muzaffarpur, Bihar ki listed hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Apun log sirf Bangalore location se kaam karte hai aisa aapne bataya aur humne check kiya ki hamare platform pe Bangalore location se buylead toh generate ho raha hai but woh kaafi limited hai jiski wajah se aapne yeh bataya ki hame services ko continue nahi karna hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir, final aapki jo confirmation call tha ki sir yaha pe agar aap check karenge na toh aisa nahi ki ekdum se Bangalore location pe nil buylead hai. Buylead se aapko time ke saath milta rahega lekin even teen jo balance aapko milta hai na 17 buylead ka balance hai woh sirf Bangalore location ki buylead nahi aap use kar pa rahe ho sir. Matlab 17 buylead aapko every week ka Bangalore ka nahi milega but aisa nahi hai ki ekdum se nil milega. Toh aap mujhe confirm karein.
Customer: Nahi sir, main teen chaar chaar din ho gaya ek bhi lead nahi mila Bangalore ka.
Customer: Bihar ka, Delhi ka, Maharashtra ka yaha ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Gujarat ka, UP ka yeh sab aa raha hai. Humko toh hum toh aise Bangalore mein work kar rahe hai. Bangalore mein hi aap kaam nahi de paoge toh hum kya fayda IndiaMART lene se?
Executive: Toh aapki company aapke Muzaffarpur ki kaise listed dikha rahi hai sir? Aapka GST toh waha ka dikha raha hai Bangalore ka.
Customer: Sir, mera GST GST mera waha ka hai lekin maine IndiaMART lene se pehle baat kiya tha, theek hai sir? Ki main work yaha karta hu, theek hai? Mere ko yaha pe kaam chahiye toh unhone bola ki haan theek hai aapko work wahi pe milega, Bangalore mein milega.
Customer: Fir baad mein bola ki pura all over India ka location hai aapko yaha yaha ka kaam aa raha hai. Hum kahe sir hum toh Bangalore mein reh rahe hai Bangalore ka humko kaam chahiye. Nahi hoga toh boliye woh bhi boliye toh bola ab aise pata nahi bola ki kuch din rehna padega uske baad aayega lead aise karke toh hum hum instant ke liye instant kaam ke liye liye hai ki ab ek mahina ke baad ek call aaya nahi aaya kuch uska koi matlab thodi hai sir.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sahi baat hai aapki aur dusra Ali sir aap jo Bangalore mein kaam karte hai toh aapne Bangalore location pe kuch address wagera hoga like office wagera hoga waha pe apna Bangalore ke andar?
Customer: Sir, mera GST bhi gaon ka hai toh wahi ka hoga na. Main yaha pe work kar raha hu, theek hai sir?
Executive: Hai na? Aap waha pe kaam karte hai toh aapka office wagera toh hoga na waha pe kuch bhi nahi hai apna matlab ki jo GST hai na aapka GST ke andar alternative address mein Bangalore ka location nahi milega?
Customer: Achha Bangalore ka location nahi milega?
Executive: Nahi milega. Kyunki waha pe agar maan lo aap dekhte ho na toh aapki company ka jo visibility hai basically aapka MDC plan mein hota kya hai na ki sirf aapko aapki location pe visibility diya jata hai. Agar aapki GST Muzaffarpur ki hai toh aapki company ko waha pe dikhaya jata hai. Usi tarike se agar hum GST mein update kar dete hai na address aapke Bangalore location ka toh uske according IndiaMART pe change kar denge toh aapki visibility as a local supplier ke basis pe Bangalore location pe hi ho sakti hai. But yeh tabhi possible hoga jab aapke GST mein address hoga sir.
Customer: GST mein address change hoga tabhi?
Executive: Haan, dusri cheez waha pe hum yeh nahi bolenge ki aapka GST mein agar Bangalore location pe aap GST address update kara denge toh buylead milega. Waha pe aapki visibility mil jayegi ki samne se agar Bangalore se koi search kare aapki services ko toh as a local supplier ke basis pe aapki company ko hum Bangalore mein dikha sakte hai but buylead jo aa raha hai sir wohi hum aapko dikha payenge Bangalore location ka. Toh mujhe final aap confirm kar lijiye ki isko kaise karna hai service deactivate karenge toh uske according mein aage proceed kar deta hu kaise kar sakte hai hum log.
Customer: Sir, yaha se ek bhi lead nahi mil rahi hai ab woh main address change karwane jaunga toh process ho jayega fir hai na? Yaha pe office wagera chahiye uske liye. Toh aap aisa karo na yaha pe mera ko mere ko ek bhi lead mila nahi hai teen teen chaar din ho gaya abhi bhi main IndiaMART khol ke rakha hu bola ki location hai woh location ko filter karke rakhiyega toh aayega main chaar din se filter karke rakha hu ek bhi nahi aaya, theek hai?
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Sir, sahi aapka kehna hai bhi humne bhi cross check kiya tha Bangalore location pe hamari us product mein kaafi kam lead generate ho raha hai specific Bangalore.
Customer: Ek bhi nahi aaya na sir. Ek bhi nahi aaya mere ko. Ek aaya tha toh woh woh bhi woh bhi matlab Karnataka mein bahut 500 kilometer ka 400 450 kilometer ka dikha raha tha utna dur kaam thodi karenge sir jaake.
Customer: 2000 kilometer utna toh thodi utna Karnataka ka dikha raha tha toh utna 2000 kilo 400 kilometer thodi jayenge kaam karne ke liye.
Executive: Bilkul sahi.
Customer: Bengaluri Bengaluri location mein kar rahe hai toh Bengaluri location mein aana chahiye na sir. Ab Bengaluri location mein aa hi nahi raha Karnataka ka aa raha tha woh Karnataka ka toh bahut area hai na sir.
Executive: Ji ji ji, mein samajh gaya aapki baat ko. Ek kaam kar leta hu mein packaging ko concern raise karke aapki services ko deactivation ke liye daal deta hu aur jaise iska refund yaha se jo bhi hamare side se initiate hoga mein aapko connect back karke update karta hu. Hum apni side se isko services ko deactivate karne ke liye upar concern raise karke aapko karwa deta hu.
Customer: Sir, deactivate kariyega toh fir uska ticket number wagera mere WhatsApp pe kar dijiyega.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul jo hum yaha se concern raise karenge uska jo ticket raise hoga concern ticket toh already raise kar diya aapko mail bhi aa gaya hoga subah mein sir.
Customer: Kitne din mein paisa refund aata hai sir?
Executive: Haan refund sir agar yeh jaise deactivate hoga uske five to six days ke andar refund initiate ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi sir ek one one to two one to two days ke mein aa jata hai refund.
Executive: Hamare yaha se initiate hone ke baad sir bank pe depend karta hai ki bank kitne time mein aapko waha se aapke account mein transfer karta hai. Hum apni side se initiate matlab ki turant basis pe kar denge like jaise services deactivate.
Customer: Sir yeh yeh aapka yeh aapka permanent number hai main ispe call kar sakta hu aapko? Main aapko WhatsApp pe bhej raha hu, hi kar raha hu aap us number pe connect back kar sakte hai. Ho sakta hai ki ispe waise call aa jayega nahi bhi aata toh aap mere personal number pe call kar sakte hai baki mein aapko WhatsApp pe update kar deta hu concern ke regarding.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Sir aap bhejiye toh ek minute hi likhe. Main aapko call kar sakta hu pehle yeh bata do aap.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul aap mujhe kar sakte hai koi dikkat nahi aap mere personal number pe call kar sakte hai mein aapko number message kar raha hu.
Customer: Sir aap hi likhe bhejo toh mere number pe sir.
Customer: Sir hi likhe bhejo aap pehle.
Customer: Sir, just dial wagera mein toh koi location ka yeh address ka koi problem hi nahi rehta sir just dial wagera mein.
Executive: Aapko WhatsApp kar diya dekhiye zara.
Customer: Yeh aapka personal number hai sir?
Executive: Haan mera yeh dusra wala number hai aap is number pe call kar sakte hai koi dikkat nahi baki mein details aapko isi number pe WhatsApp pe daal deta hu.
Customer: Sir toh aap abhi manne ke abhi deactivate karoge toh ticket number kitne din mein generate ho jata hai?
Executive: Sir refund generate hoga aur jaise hamare yaha se service deactivate hogi turant hum log yaha pe refund initiate karne ke liye request daal denge 24 ghante ke andar hamari side se refund initiate ho jayega aur uske baad depend karta hai ki aapke bank wale kab tak isko aapke account mein transfer kare matlab mostly most 10 days le sakte hai hardly sir.
Customer: Nahi sir main karwaya tha na ek baar one days mein hi aa gaya tha ticket number sabne bhej diya, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan ticket number bhej diya ticket number bhej diya uske one days mein hi aa gaya.
Executive: Yeh maximum time bata raha hu sir yeh maximum time hota hai 10 days seven to 10 days.
Customer: Kitne kitne? 3 tarikh ko usne cancel kiya 4 tarikh ko refund aa gaya.
Executive: Haan toh aise jaise ki agar hamare yaha se hoga na hum toh sir within 24 hours ke andar yaha se initiate kar denge aur kabhi kabhi depend karta hai bank pe bhi turant aapke account mein daal dete hai aur kabhi kabhi woh thoda sa time le leta hai.
Customer: Achha. Toh aapne aisa karo deactivate kar diyo.
Executive: Are kiya nahi hu sir concern upar raise kiya hua hai mein confirmation ke liye hi call kiya tha isko kaise kar sakte hai kyunki Bangalore location ka yeh lead nahi hai yeh scenario jo discussion karne ke liye connect kiya tha.
Customer: Theek hai sir aap usko cancel hi kar do.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir.
Customer: Aur aur sir ticket number isi WhatsApp pe bhej dena sir aap. Kitne din mein ticket number aa jayega?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Ruk na yaar.
Customer: Jyada important nahi raha kaam.
Customer: Lead nahi rahega toh kaun fayda kaam leke IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan? 3-4 din ho gaya ek bhi lead nahi aaya toh kya fayda lene ka?
Customer: Dhundhiya kya agar GST bhi toh ho jayega na.
Customer: Toh pehle hum sir ke pehle bata diye the sir hai na.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan yaar abhi dekhiye na zara lekar unka kaam toh kariye laiye kitna mein diya? 30 kilometer. Chal ja abhi chaaro ko sahi hai maar ke chalega. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ja hum baat kar lo na hum jisse se baat kar lo. Toh chala na hum chalo.
Customer: Hai lag raha police pakadte. Chala hum baat kar lete hai na bhai humse jisse mangte hai toh.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Yeh pakadte hai. Yeh. Logo ke liye bhej de abhi. Bhej de na. Yeh pehna na tha.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Kya hai? Naak laga lenge andar mein. Yeh baat hai hum laga lenge se kathi toh naak laga lenge. Check kar bhai bahar aur andar mein kitna hai. Saanp maati. Suno bahar mein toh maara tha.
Customer: Laga ke maar de. Samajh gaye? Hello?
Customer: Sir bol kyun nahi rahe sir hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Jaise jaise koi problem nahi hai location wala. Haan? Ek minute.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Chalo dekh lena.
Customer: Toh samajh mein nahi aa raha call pe jaake kahi pe beech ke upar isko bahut mushkil hai. Jyada 12 ko 14 ko highest kar sakte hai. Usme sudhrenge. Samajh gaye? Kahi pe kuch karoge waha pe kuch problem nahi tha.
Customer: Dekho na hello. Batao na ruk na yaar ruk yeh toh.
Customer: Dekha raha hai na le.
Customer: Haan? Kuch aa ki taraf? 200 meter se left le lo aap. Service wala road mein le lijiye service wala road mein.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Yeh rasta hai woh rasta leke pura chal. Haan. Woh rasta jaise jaise jaise jaise chal. Aage se left hai yeh rasta left se mudega. Kat ke 400 meter tak.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads from Bangalore location.

- Wants to deactivate the IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive raised concern for deactivation.

- Executive will connect back and update on refund.

- Executive shared his personal number on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Deactivation process initiated.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, deactivation, location
